resources.string:
==Discovery== **Discovered by:** Michael E. Brown, Chad Trujillo, David Rabinowitz
 **Discovery date:** March 31, 2005
 **Minor planet category:** dwarf planet, plutoid, TNO (cubewano)
==Orbital characteristics== **Distance from sun:** 6,850 million km (45.8 AU)
 **Aphelion:** 7,940 million km (53.1 AU)
 **Perihelion:** 5,761 million km (38.5 AU)
 **Eccentricity:** 0.159
 **Orbital period:** 309.88 years
 **Average orbital speed:** 4.419 km/s
 **Inclination to ecliptic:** 28.96°
==Physical characteristics== **Mean radius:** 710 ± 30 km
 **Volume:** ~1.5×10^^9^^ km³
 **Mass:** ~3×10^^21^^ kg
 **Mean density:** ~2 g/cm³ (assumed)
 **Equatorial surface gravity:** ~0.4 m/s²
 **Escape velocity:** ~0.75 km/s
 **Sidereal rotation period:** 7h 46m 16s
 **Axial tilt:** unknown
 **Albedo:** 69.6 - 88.5 (geometric)
 **Temperature:** 30–35 K (assuming albedo)
 **Spectral type:** B-V=0.83, V-R=0.5


Find out more on [[http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Makemame_(dwarf_planet)|wikipedia]].
